description: This notion template shares my all-in-one productivity system.I made it because:i get distracted easily and i dont want to have to open 7 windows to do anything on my laptophabit trackers have seriously been game changing for my self improvement. so game changing that i was paying 15$ a month for a habit tracker that was simple but allowed me to collect the data i needed. i wanted to see if i could create something free in notion.i work on multiple projects at once and i like to get my ideas dow
features: i get distracted easily and i dont want to have to open 7 windows to do anything on my laptop
